recipe.title: Watermelon, Ricotta Salata, Basil, and Pine Nut Salad
ingredients: 1 4-pound seedless watermelon, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (about 6 cups)
1/2 pound ricotta salata (salted dry ricotta cheese),* cut into 1/4-inch cubes
instructions: Whisk first 3 ingredients in small bowl. Season dressing with salt and pepper. Place watermelon and ricotta salata in medium serving bowl. Drizzle with dressing; toss. Sprinkle with pine nuts.
*Available at supermarkets, Italian markets, and specialty foods stores.
